news.Title: [AI Summary] 精材10月營收年增5.62%，近期股價呈下跌趨勢
news.Content: • 股價變動無相關重大新聞報導，過去一週股價變動幅度為 -4.14%。, • 精材於 2025 年 10 月公布合併營收為 7.12 億元，年增 5.62% [1]。 【綜合分析】 參考來源：Yahoo奇摩股市: 1則 | 資料期間：2025-11-10 至 2025-11-10 | 新聞數量：1 則 儘管精材（3374）公布 2025 年 10 月合併營收表現穩健，達 7.12 億元，年增 5.62% [1]，但近期股價卻呈現下跌趨勢。根據提供的股價資訊，精材最新收盤價為 139.00 元，較前一日的 142.00 元下跌 2.11%。進一步觀察，過去一週股價已累計下跌 4.14%，顯示市場情緒偏向謹慎。五日前（2025年11月28日）的收盤價為 145.00 元，與現價相比，股價已明顯回落。目前僅有一則新聞資料，主要聚焦於 10 月營收數據，並未提及對股價有直接影響的利多或利空消息。市場分析師指出，儘管營收成長是正面訊號，但投資人可能正在評估其他宏觀經濟因素，或是對產業前景有不同的預期，進而影響了近期股價的走勢。後續需關注公司是否有進一步的營運展望或產業動態發布，以釐清股價波動的原因。 （註：新聞連結中的部分內容為其他公司公告，已排除與精材無關資訊。）

news.Title: [AI Summary] Xintec October Revenue Up 5.62% YoY, Stock Shows Downward Trend Recently
news.Content: • No significant news reports related to price movement. Weekly price change was -4.14%., • Xintec reported consolidated revenue of NT$712 million for October 2025, a year-on-year increase of 5.62% [1]. [Analysis] Sources: Yahoo Finance: 1 News | Period: 2025-11-10 To 2025-11-10 | Number of News: 1 Xintec (3374) announced solid consolidated revenue for October 2025, reaching NT$712 million, a year-on-year increase of 5.62% [1]. However, the company's stock price has recently shown a downward trend. According to the provided stock price information, Xintec's latest closing price was NT$139.00, a 2.11% decrease from the previous day's NT$142.00. Over the past week, the stock has accumulated a decline of 4.14%, indicating cautious market sentiment. The closing price five days prior (November 28, 2025) was NT$145.00, showing a notable pullback from the current price. With only one news item available, primarily focusing on the October revenue figures, there is no mention of specific positive or negative news directly impacting the stock price. Market analysts suggest that while revenue growth is a positive signal, investors may be evaluating other macroeconomic factors or have different expectations for the industry's outlook, influencing the recent stock performance. Further updates on the company's operational outlook or industry developments will be needed to clarify the reasons behind the stock's fluctuation. (Note: Some content in the news link pertains to other companies' announcements and has been excluded as it is not relevant to Xintec.)
